thread.title: RT - Daily news: Guccifer 2.0 accuses US of ‘falsifying evidence,’ denies Russian links
thread.title_full: RT - Daily news: Guccifer 2.0 accuses US of ‘falsifying evidence,’ denies Russian links

author: RT
title: RT - Daily news: Guccifer 2.0 accuses US of ‘falsifying evidence,’ denies Russian links
text:
Guccifer 2.0 accuses US of ‘falsifying evidence,’ denies Russian links Published time: 13 Jan, 2017 00:10 Get short URL © Silas Stein / www.globallookpress.com An entity claiming to be the mysterious hacker or hackers Guccifer 2.0 says a “vulnerability” in the Democratic Party’s computer software and not Russian state actors allowed them to gain access to private campaign information. Trends Viral 
Guccifer 2.0, who took credit for the hack on the Democratic National Committee, appears to have posted online for the first time since November. 
READ MORE: Guccifer 2.0 angry about his DNC hack being blamed on Russians – WSJ 
Guccifer 2.0 has been linked to the Russian government by the US Intelligence Community over allegations of election interference. Here I am again, my friends! Check my new post about FBI/DHS/NSA reports & their fake evidence #Guccifer2 https://t.co/Low4v1qCQx — GUCCIFER 2.0 (@GUCCIFER_2) January 12, 2017 
The short article “written by Guccifer 2” on a Wordpress blog site refutes suggestions of Russian involvement. ‘ #Guccifer 2.0’ releases hacked DNC docs revealing mega donors, #Clinton collusion https://t.co/thFaNuKAdS pic.twitter.com/4wtPbzQW0s — RT (@RT_com) June 17, 2016 
Thursday’s blog post, which could not be verified by RT, is the same medium on which DNC documents have previously been leaked. 
“I’d like to make it clear enough that these accusations are unfounded. I have totally no relation to the Russian government. I’d like to tell you once again I was acting in accordance with my personal political views and beliefs,” the Guccifer 2.0 blog read . Read more ‘Fake cyber war’: Hacker ‘Guccifer’ says US obsessed with Russian invasion 
“I already explained at The Future of Cyber Security Europe conference that took place in London in last September, I had used a different way to breach into the DNC network. I found a vulnerability in the NGP VAN software installed in the DNC system.” 
READ MORE: Guccifer 2.0: More hacked DNC documents revealed at cyber conference 
The supposed hacking entity added that it believes US intelligence agencies “are deliberately falsifying evidence” to detract from the Democratic Party’s recent failed presidential campaign. 
“In my opinion, they’re playing into the hands of the Democrats who are trying to blame foreign actors for their failure.” 
Guccifer 2.0 is an apparent tribute to Romanian hacker Marcel Lehel Lazar, known as Guccifer, who is currently in prison for a number of cybercrimes, including breaching the computer networks of US officials.
